CHAT.comment: BENEFICIAL NATIONAL BANK, ET AL., Petitioners v. MARIE ANDERSON, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MATTHEW D. ROBERTS ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BRIAN M. CLARK ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:57 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
